title: Need help identifying this "e" in Valley
content:
I know this is hand drawn type, but I was wondering if anyone knew a typeface close to this? [http://cl.ly/image/1j3B2S131X46](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213818/http:/cl.ly/image/1j3B2S131X46 "http://cl.ly/image/1j3B2S131X46")

Thanks!

| --- | --- |

author: animal

comments.content:
It reminds me a bit of [Rubens](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213818/http:/myfonts.us/td-wUUTQh), an old wood type design.

- Mike Yanega
